title: Sergei Troitskiy
text:
Sergei Gennadyevich Troitskiy (; born 14 February 1961) is a former <a href="Russia">Russia</a>n professional <a href="Association%20football">football</a>er.
Club career.
He made his professional debut in the <a href="Soviet%20Second%20League">Soviet Second League</a> in 1981 for <a href="FC%20Dynamo%20Bryansk">FC Dynamo Bryansk</a>.
